title: Did your least favorite airport make the list of the worst airports in the world?
text: Did your least favorite airport make the list of the worst airports in the world? Sunday, 25 October 2015 (22 minutes ago) When it's raining outside, does it rain inside too at your local airport? If you live in anywhere Port Harcourt International Airport in Nigeria, your answer may be yes, and if you live in New York City , you may have similar gripes.
